author: Alyssa
title: Dairy-Free Hot Chocolate
ingredients: 3 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder (or raw cacao)
Stevia or monk fruit extract to taste
instructions_list: Head the almond milk in a small saucepan.
Once warm, whisk in unsweetened cocoa powder and coconut butter. Sprinkle in some cinnamon and stevia/monk fruit extract, based on your taste.
description: This dairy-free hot chocolate (which also happens to be refined sugar-free and fairly low-calorie) was the perfect drink to cure my cold winter blues.
